featured.text: For many older Americans, the prom was a modest, home-grown affair in the school gymnasium.
The prom has changed from a modest event to a glamorous party over the years. 47.

definition.zh_def: 謙虛的；不張揚的；適度的
definition.en_def: Having or showing a moderate or humble estimate of one's merits, importance, or abilities.
definition.example: She wore a modest dress to the party.
